message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this fantastic product.  Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $15,000. What are your thoughts?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Can you meet me halfway?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $10,000 is too low, I'm open to finding a middle ground. How about we settle on $13,500?
I'm still a bit above my budget. Can we try $12,500? I'm willing to meet you halfway from our previous offers.
